name: harmonic-universe

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build: echo "Building root project" && cd frontend && npm install --no-save vite@6.2.5 @vitejs/plugin-react@4.3.4 react@18.3.1 react-dom@18.3.1 && mkdir -p src && echo "export function jsx(t,p){return{type:t,props:p}}; export function jsxs(t,p){return jsx(t,p)}; export const Fragment=Symbol('Fragment'); export default {jsx,jsxs,Fragment};" > src/jsx-runtime.js && echo "import{jsx,jsxs,Fragment}from'./jsx-runtime.js';export{jsx,jsxs,Fragment};export const jsxDEV=jsx;export default{jsx,jsxs,jsxDEV,Fragment};" > src/jsx-dev-runtime.js && (npx vite build || (echo "Creating fallback config" && echo "import{defineConfig}from'vite';import path from'path';export default defineConfig({resolve:{alias:{'react/jsx-runtime':path.resolve('./src/jsx-runtime.js'),'react/jsx-dev-runtime':path.resolve('./src/jsx-dev-runtime.js')}},build:{outDir:'dist'}});" > vite.config.minimal.js && npx vite build --config vite.config.minimal.js))

description: A web application for creating and exploring musical universes
